data.lyric:
[ti:All Girls Are The Same (Explicit)]
[ar:Juice WRLD]
[al:All Girls Are The Same]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]All Girls Are The Same (Explicit) - Juice WRLD
[00:01.57]Produced by：Nick Mira
[00:03.14]They're rotting my brain love
[00:05.95]These h**s are the same
[00:11.60]I admit it another ho got me finished
[00:14.80]Broke my heart oh no you didn't
[00:17.82]F**k sippin' I'ma down a whole bottle
[00:20.73]Hard liquor hard truth can't swallow
[00:23.53]Need a bartender put me out of my sorrow
[00:26.73]Wake up the next day in the Monte Carlo
[00:29.53]With a new woman tell me she from Colorado
[00:32.49]And she love women she'll be gone by tomorrow
[00:35.16]Who am I kiddin'
[00:36.78]All this jealousy and agony that I sit in
[00:39.66]I'm a jealous boy really feel like John Lennon
[00:42.64]I just want real love guess it's been a minute
[00:45.60]Pissed off from the way that I don't fit in I don't fit in
[00:49.76]Tell me what's the secret to love I don't get it
[00:52.58]Feel like I be runnin' a race I'm not winnin'
[00:55.61]Ran into the devil today and she grinnin'
[01:05.14]Hey these girls are insane
[01:10.85]All girls are the same
[01:14.19]They're rotting my brain love
[01:17.23]Think I need a change
[01:19.97]Before I go insane love
[01:23.15]All girls are the same
[01:25.95]They're rotting my brain love
[01:28.99]Think I need a change
[01:31.81]Before I go insane love
[01:34.68]Ten minutes she tell me it would take ten minutes
[01:37.75]To break my heart oh no she didn't
[01:40.76]F**k livin' I'ma drown in my sorrow
[01:43.75]F**k givin' I'ma take not borrow
[01:46.52]And I'm still sinnin' I'm still losin' my mind
[01:49.42]I know I been trippin' I'm still wastin' my time
[01:52.32]All the time given am I dyin' 
[01:54.54]Am I livin'
[01:55.57]It's f**k feelings my sorrow go up to the ceilin'
[02:10.47]Now I am insane
[02:13.48]Demons in my brain love
[02:16.40]Peace I can't obtain
[02:19.19]'Cause all these girls the same love
[02:22.33]Now I am insane
[02:25.24]Demons in my brain love
[02:28.21]Peace I can't obtain
[02:31.03]'Cause all these girls the same love
data.trans:
[ti:All Girls Are The Same (Explicit)]
[ar:Juice WRLD]
[al:All Girls Are The Same]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:01.57]//
[00:03.14]他们肆意践踏我的智商 我的爱情
[00:05.95]所有女人都一样
[00:11.60]我承认 有个女孩让我不再这样想
[00:14.80]让我心碎不已 看来你并没有反思
[00:17.82]不要再浅酌 直接对瓶畅饮一番
[00:20.73]烈酒与真相总是让人难以接受
[00:23.53]亟需酒保让我畅饮 带我走出伤心事
[00:26.73]次日在蒙特卡洛醒来
[00:29.53]身边完全是个陌生女人 她告诉我她来自科罗拉多
[00:32.49]她不喜欢异性 明天就要离开这里
[00:35.16]竟然逗我玩
[00:36.78]所有的妒忌与愤怒接踵而至
[00:39.66]我是个爱吃醋的人 像约翰·列侬一样
[00:42.64]我只想遇上真爱 我想还需要时间吧
[00:45.60]不适宜的恋爱 总是让人懊恼不已
[00:49.76]请告诉我爱情的真谛 我却无法理解其中真意
[00:52.58]这感觉就像竞赛 心中明白终不会赢得胜利
[00:55.61]简直像是天方夜谭 她面带嘲笑
[01:05.14]这些女孩简直疯了
[01:10.85]天下女人都一样
[01:14.19]他们肆意践踏我的智商 我的爱情
[01:17.23]我想我需要去改变
[01:19.97]在我为爱痴狂之前
[01:23.15]天下女孩都一样
[01:25.95]他们肆意践踏我的智商 我的爱情
[01:28.99]我想我需要去改变
[01:31.81]在我为爱痴狂之前
[01:34.68]十分钟 她说只需十分钟的时间
[01:37.75]就可让我心碎不已 她并没有这么做
[01:40.76]残酷的生活 我沉浸在悲伤之中
[01:43.75]可恶的施舍 我不要吃嗟来之食
[01:46.52]我依然在犯错 依然没有恢复理智
[01:49.42]我知道我这一路充满坎坷 依然在虚度时光
[01:52.32]我每天都在想 我到底活着 
[01:54.54]亦或已经逝去
[01:55.57]这感觉真糟糕 我的悲伤已达到顶点
[02:10.47]此刻 我变得疯狂
[02:13.48]恶魔占据我的大脑 侵蚀我的爱情
[02:16.40]我无法获得心灵的平静
[02:19.19]只因天下女人都一样
[02:22.33]此刻 我变得疯狂
[02:25.24]恶魔占据我的大脑 侵蚀我的爱情
[02:28.21]我无法获得心灵的平静
[02:31.03]只因天下女人都一样
